title: Passwords in Thunderbird
content:
When I go to Thunderbird Settings,then Saved Passwords I get a rather large (width) window that must have the passwords behind the right-hand border. I can find no way to scroll, change window size, etc in order to view my passwords. My wife;s computer which has Thunderbird, however, has the small window that mine used to have that can be sized to view all of the data including the passwords.

Please respond asap. Also, please send an email and send to nmesusa@gmail.com.

Thank you!
